rundown: 10-7 W @ Kansas City Royals Spencer Strider: 5.0 innings, 2 earned runs, 7 hits, 0 HR, 3 strikeouts Batters: Austin Riley (2 hits - 4 AB, 1 HR, 4 RBI) Ronald Acuña Jr. (2 hits - 4 AB, 1 HR, 2 RBI) Marcell Ozuna (1 hit - 3 AB, 1 HR, 2 RBI) The Braves secured a victory against the Kansas City Royals with a strong offensive performance, scoring 10 runs despite allowing 7 runs. Key highlights include Austin Riley's standout game with 4 RBIs, Ronald Acuña Jr. contributing with both a home run and 2 RBIs, and Marcell Ozuna adding to the scoring with another home run. The Braves' ability to capitalize on scoring opportunities was crucial in this high-scoring affair.
